name: My Favourite Movies
info: An app to search for and save a user's favourite movies. Created as a group project in a team of 4

name: Weather App
info: An app to search for weather in different cities across the world. The user can then view the current weather and a 5 day forecast

name: Daily Planner App
info: Plan the work day using this app, with colour coded time slots

name: README Generator
info: An app to generate a professional README by taking in user input from the command line

name: Profile Generator
info: An app to take a user input from the command line and generate a HTML page to display user profiles of a team

name: Code Quiz
info: A simple coding quiz where users can save their highscores using local storage
